snippet: Matthew Vines, 22, uses a widely seen video and speeches to plead with others to consider the plight of the modern gay Christian.
abstract: Matthew Vines uses a widely seen video and speeches to plead with others to consider the plight of the modern gay Christian; his recordings tackle the traditional interpretations of all six Bible passages that refer to homosexual acts, arguing that they do not actually condemn, or even address, the modern understanding of homosexuality.
lead_paragraph: Matthew Vines, 22, uses a widely seen video and speeches to plead with others to consider the plight of the modern gay Christian.

headline.seo: Matthew Vines Won’t Rest in Defending Gay Christians
headline.main: Turned Away, He Turned to the Bible
headline.print_headline: Turned Away, He Turned To the Bible
